import React from 'react' import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { logout } from '../../redux/actions/authAction' import { GLOBALTYPES } from '../../redux/actions/globalTypes' import Avatar from '../Avatar' import NotifyModal from '../NotifyModal' // import NotifyModal from '../NotifyModal' const Menu = () => { const { auth, theme, notify } = useSelector(state => state) const navLinks = [ // { label: 'Reports', icon: 'report', path: '/reports', admin: true }, { label: 'Home', icon: 'house', path: '/' }, { label: 'Message', icon: 'forum', path: '/message' }, { label: 'Discover', icon: 'south_america', path: '/discover' }, ] if (auth.user.role === 'admin') { navLinks.unshift({ label: 'Reports', icon: 'report', path: '/reports' }) // navLinks.unshift({ label: 'User management', icon: 'manage', path: '/usersmanage' }) } const dispatch = useDispatch() const { pathname } = useLocation() const isActive = (pn) => { if (pn === pathname) return 'active' } return (
    {/* {auth.user.role === 'admin' && (
  • report
    • )} */} { navLinks.map((link, index) => ( (link.admin && !auth.admin) ? null : (
  • {link.icon}
    • ) )) }
  • 0 ? '#0066ff' : '' }}> notifications {/* favorite */} {notify.data.length}
  • Profile

) } export default Menu
